synopsis.text: After a narrow escape from drowning, Youtarou Misaki finds himself on the shores of an unfamiliar beach. He is rescued by Arashi Mutou, the kind-hearted owner of a local diner, Kurage no Shokudou. Despite remembering his past, including the tragic loss of his twin brother, Youtarou feigns amnesia and chooses to withhold his true identity from Arashi. As he settles into his new life at the diner, Youtarou must navigate the complexities of his self-imposed identity crisis, all while keeping his past a secret. Will he be able to maintain his lie, or will the truth eventually come to light? Join Youtarou on his emotional journey of self-discovery and redemption in this captivating anime.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
